## Project.Abstract.hasPeerDependency() method

Returns a boolean representing if the project has a given pkg listed as a dependency or devDependency

Signature:

```typescript
abstract hasPeerDependency(pkg: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| pkg       | string |             |

Returns:

boolean
